Breakpoints

Usage

Default breakpoints


  $breakpoints: (
    xxs: 320px,
    xs: 480px,
    sm: 640px,
    md: 768px,
    lg: 960px,
    xl: 1180px,
    xxl: 1400px
  ) !default;

Media query mixin

@include breakpoint(xs) { ... }

Shorthand media query mixin

  • @include xxs { ... }
  • @include xs { ... }
  • @include sm { ... }
  • @include md { ... }
  • @include lg { ... }
  • @include xl { ... }
  • @include xxl { ... }

HTML class breakpoint suffixes

  • @xxs
  • @xs
  • @sm
  • @md
  • @lg
  • @xl
  • @xxl

Resources

  • Jaywing Frontend Component Library
